attributes.action: stop the Football Association from getting rid of drawn matches and replacing them with penalty shootouts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yesterday the Football Association proposed to stop having drawn matches in the Football League and instead replace them with penalty-shootouts.  This cannot happen! We cannot let the tradition go out of the game! The Championship is the 4th most popular league in Europe and this system will make it (and Leagues 1 and 2) the laughing stock of Europe.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
